item.title: [DISTRELEC-5056] Total redesign of “DistCarpetComponent”
item.description:
Requirements

  • “DistCarpetItem” Size large not needed anymore
  • 4 columns instead of 3
  • Minimum “DistCarpetItems” for working “DistCarpetComponent” are 4 (one row)
    • If “DistCarpetItem” is created on “Content Page Without Navigation Template” there is an issue that 4 elements can’t be divided to 66% - that’s why the old and the new “DistCarpetComponent” should better coexist (e.g. “DistPromoboxComponent” and “DistPromoboxItem” for the new version
  • Similar to old “DistCarpetItem” the new “DistPromoboxItem” should be able to use PIM data based on Product ID or teasers (manually uploaded images) size: 220x300px
  • All “DistPromoboxItems” that are based on a Product ID are displayed as follows:
    • Manufacturer Logo on the top left corner
    • Product label (e.g. 11025572 with label “noMover = Sale”) on the top right corner
    • Product image in the middle
    • Same text (base item-name and promotion-text ) should be displayed as in the existing “DistCarpetItem” (both black, bold for item-name, regular for promotion-text)
    • Horizontal line dividing CTA & price section from image & text section
    • Button
      • Add a shape (background for CTA button) with Distrelec Petrol colour on the left (80x20px)
      • Add functionality to add white text appearing centered on this shape
    • Currency code (3 letters) has to be displayed vertically with 5 pixels margin to the price
    • Display price based on Product ID (incl. or excl. VAT based on Channel settings (B2B or B2C) with space for 6 digits before and 2 digits after the divider (article 11082322 costs 188300.00 SEK) and don't add any thousand separators
    • Another horizontal line dividing CTA & price section from end of the “DistPromoboxItem” (1 pixel, grey)
    • STEP one: Add functionality to add additional text in same font as the promotion-text above
    • STEP two: Add functionality to display the original price (strikethrough) as well as a calculated difference in percentage compared to the new price (percentage right aligned, 2 spaces between original price and minus sign of percentage)
  • It should be possible to display several “DistPromoboxComponents” on the same homepage
  • Between the “DistPromoboxItems” there has to be 20px white space
  • Possibility to fill the new carpet with a FactFinder query should be kept.

Also see https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/911-2+Redesign+Carpet

Open Questions
Exact size of product image container => According to the newest Design-Mockup (see attachments) the size is 220x123px
Exact size of manufacturer logo (with the follow-up question, whether the currently available size from PIM is adequate for resizing in the browser) => We made the manufacturer logo slot even bigger. It's now 27 pixels in height, logo needs to be left aligned and then resized accoridngly
Is the button wide enough for all languages? => We also made the button bigger, it's now 80x20px

--> Further changes:

  • the label (Sale, New, etc.) has to be placed in the top right corner and has to be 27px high
  • the actual price needs to be right aligned!
  • All margins are now in the Mockup, when you add everything together (including two times 1px for the separators) it is 300px in height

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4708] Basic performance monitoring using JavaMelody
item.description:
Each performance optimization step should be monitored before/after.
Since we do not have any monitoring tool in place right now (or is there an update from Önder) I suggest to try using JavaMelody.

https://code.google.com/p/javamelody/

This tool measures on the servers itselfs and tracks CPU and memory usage, response time, etc. including graphical representation and historical data.
